about.title: About the Attorney
about.name: Serhii Proidak
about.description: Experienced attorney with many years of practice in the field of legal services. Specializes in protecting the rights and interests of clients in various areas of law.
about.subtitle: Serhii Proidak
about.descriptionPart2: My advantage is the combination of a fresh perspective and profound knowledge. I am not afraid of complex situations and always look for unconventional solutions to provide the client with the best possible result.
about.descriptionPart3: It is important for me that every client feels supported and confident in the future.
about.educationText: Yaroslav Mudryi National Law University, specialty "Law"
about.qualificationText: Qualification and Disciplinary Commission of the Bar, certificate of the right to practice law
about.professionalismText: Modern approaches to defense and the latest legal tools
about.confidentialityText: Guarantee of complete confidentiality of client information
about.individualApproachText: Unconventional solutions for the best result

services.title: Our Services
services.criminalDesc: Defense in criminal cases, court representation, consultations on criminal law.
services.civilDesc: Resolution of civil, family, housing and labor disputes, drafting contracts, divorce, property division, alimony.
services.corporateDesc: Legal support for businesses, corporate disputes, registration and liquidation of enterprises.
services.militaryDesc: Legal assistance on border crossing for military personnel, VLK passage, booking registration.
services.administrativeDesc: Defense in administrative offense cases, appeals against actions of authorities.
services.consultationDesc: Professional legal consultations, document analysis, legal opinions.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions from our clients

item1.question: How long does the first consultation last?
item1.answer: The first consultation usually lasts about 1 hour. During the consultation, we will discuss your situation in detail and determine the best strategy to protect your interests.

item2.question: How much do attorney services cost?
item2.answer: The cost of services depends on the complexity of your case and the amount of work required. After the first consultation, I will be able to provide you with detailed information about the cost of services.

item3.question: Is it possible to get a consultation online?
item3.answer: Yes, I provide online consultations via Zoom, Skype, or other platforms convenient for you. This is convenient for clients who cannot visit my office in person.

item4.question: How quickly can you take on my case?
item4.answer: I try to take on new cases as quickly as possible. Usually, we can start work within 1-3 days after the first consultation and signing the contract.

item5.question: What documents should I prepare for the first consultation?
item5.answer: For the first consultation, it is advisable to have all documents related to your case: contracts, correspondence, court documents, etc. This will help me better understand your situation and provide the most effective consultation.
